title: Protest in Piliyandala; Movement disrupted
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The movement of traffic has come to a standstill following a protest in the Piliyandala Town.
Traffic congestion was reported along the Piliyandala – Kesbewa Main Raod.
The News 1st Correspondents reported that protester were voicing their concerns and anger towards the government.
